itemDescription: British Labour Party politician and trade unionist, MP for Smethwick for one day in 1945

wikipedia_page.main: Alfred James Dobbs (18 June 1882 – 27 July 1945) was a British Labour Party politician and trade unionist. He died in a car accident the day after he had been elected as a Member of Parliament (MP) for Smethwick. His one day as an MP remains the shortest term in the era after the Second World War.
